site_name: Development Site At 1 Lees Place, 43 North Audley Street And
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 16th July 2018 (RN 18/03455/FULL) which varied conditions 1, 32, and 35 of  planning permission dated 26 September 2017 (RN: 17/05807/FULL) (with amendments including creation of entrance on the corner of Grosvenor Square and North Audley Street, creation of sub-basement level to accommodate mechanical plant and staff facilities, single storey extension to the rear, single storey extension at fifth floor to provide additional hotel accommodation, conversion of ground floor to full food and beverage facilities, creation of mezzanine floor between first and second floor levels to accommodate plant, and other physical works) which itself varied the originally approved scheme dated 19.7.16 (16/01401/FULL) for the Use of 22 Grosvenor Square, 43 North Audley Street and 1 Lees Place as a hotel, restaurant and private members club/bar (Sui Generis), with works including the infilling of the alleyway to the rear of 43 North Audley Street, partial demolition and rebuilding of 43 North Audley Street to provide a building of two storeys plus mansard, erection of a two storey extension to the rear facade of 1 Lees Place, including the extension of the basement floor to the front facade; installation of plant, the creation of a terrace at roof level of 22 Grosvenor Square and associated internal and external alterations NAMELY, to accommodate a number of design changes as a result of detailed design development, including the provision of additional mechanical plant at roof level. (Linked to 19/06360/LBC)
